text: James Elroy Risch (born May 3, 1943) is the junior United States Senator from Idaho. He is a member of the U.S. Republican Party and has been in Senate since January 3, 2009. Risch was born on May 3, 1943 in Milwaukee, Wisconsin. He graduated from the University of Idaho. He is married to Vicki Risch. They have three children. ==References== ==Other websites== * Jim Risch, U.S. Senator for Idaho, Home Page Category:1943 births Category:Living people Category:Politicians from Milwaukee Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians Category:United States senators from Idaho Category:Governors of Idaho Category:Lieutenant Governors of Idaho Category:Lawyers from Milwaukee Category:Members of the Idaho Legislature
title: Jim Risch
